channel.title: What number do you put in the port thingy? Also other concerns
channel.description: Ok.....What number do you put in the port thingy? I want to play with other players...not only me! I changed my IP, like for example, :127.0.0.1 (which is the one I've been playing on for today which I want to play with my friends) Also when I want to change my character into a girl, when i try to click accept, it just keeps the selection screen there. So please reply to help me. Thank You. :confused: :)[br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2007, 03:10:34 PM[/size][hr]Please answer people...I need some help...

item.title: What number do you put in the port thingy? Also other concerns
item.dc:creator: @spambot spambot
item.description:
@spambot wrote:

well the port for 127.0.0.1 is 43594 if you go into the server adratisement section of the forums they will have server ips (which replaces 127.0.0.1 the port (to change the port hit file new port and type it in) and weather it requires hamachi or not type in the details needed and you will play on other servers people have made

Read full topic
item.source: What number do you put in the port thingy? Also other concerns

item.title: What number do you put in the port thingy? Also other concerns
item.dc:creator: @theg4l4u425 theg4l4u425
item.description:
@theg4l4u425 wrote:

Ok…What number do you put in the port thingy? I want to play with other players…not only me! I changed my IP, like for example, :127.0.0.1 (which is the one I’ve been playing on for today which I want to play with my friends) Also when I want to change my character into a girl, when i try to click accept, it just keeps the selection screen there. So please reply to help me. Thank You. :)[br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2007, 03:10:34 PM[/size][hr]Please answer people…I need some help…
